img.alt: FREE SCHOOL BREAKFAST & LUNCH Featured Photo

div.div:
EFFECTIVE WEDNESDAY, APRIL 8, 2020 MEAL DISTRIBUTIONS WILL ONLY OCCUR ON MONDAYS AND WEDNESDAYS.
Please click headline for details on pickup times, verification forms and food storage guides.
Under the recommendation of the Los Angeles County Office of Education, schools will be physically closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year, and Distance Learning Programs will continue.

img.alt: Support Our Schools by Completing the 2020 Census Featured Photo

h3.a: Support Our Schools by Completing the 2020 Census

div.div: The Census helps shape every aspect of our entire community. By completing the Census, you are helping to ensure that AUSD receives the adequate funding needed to support our schools, programs and students! Complete your survey today: https://my2020census.gov/ or call 1-844-330-2020!
